page.title: 02A day in the life of Claire
page.content: I wake up, have a look outside to see what it is like. I choose my clothes, according to the weather.When my mum shouts me, I go downstairs to the bathroom, have a wash and clean my teeth. Then I have some toast and coffee. I get dressed, get my bag, say goodbye to my mum and brother, then I go to call for Tammy Clark. We start to hurry to school because it is getting late. The whistle goes then we have assembly.After assembly we go in to our classroom, have registration, we have English,followed by playtime,then Maths and television. After dinner we have topic and P.E. We go home and I play with my friends. My mum calls me in for tea.When I finish my tea I go back out and play with my friends.At 9.00p.m. I go in, have a wash,clean my teeth,and brush my hair. I go to bed and read.
